name: Accuser (V)
Lore: 'Modified for optimal crisis response time. Veteran crew experienced at monitoring shipping lanes and Imperial port traffic.',
Text: 'Deploy -3 if Death Star II on table. May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles, and 4 TIEs. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2. Power and forfeit +1 for each Rebel starship here.',
